availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas G. Poore (Hickman County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Clinton, Hickman County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Moss Poore in Adair County on November 24, 1852. Clerk of the Hickman Circuit Court in 1860. Attorney practicing in the Hickman Circuit Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton, p. 502.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Adair County Marriages, Film #001904584, p. 162.
